runs.comm: that had 'smash me' written all over it... half tracker down the leg side, easy whip for Rohit to deep square leg
slower through the air and pushed to the off side
he goes on the backfoot and punches it to cover and sets off
Hodge has the last laugh against Rohit! Very soft dismissal, tossed up outside off, Rohit aims to clear cover, he gets an outside edge that tamely lobs up to point
quicker one and he punches it to the on side
low full toss and he forces it down to long-on
flatter one and Maxwell clips it to the leg side
he goes back and punches it with the turn to long-on and jogs the single
this was pushed through far quicker and he pushes it to long-on
he fires this wide down the leg side
he stays back and punches it to the on side
pushed through quicker and he drives to the off side
that came out of nowhere! After a few quiet deliveries Kohli gets on his knee and slogs him high and quick over deep midwicket, tremendous bat speed there
full outside off and he pushes it to mid-off
nicely timed, he fetches this from outside off and with a gentle flick of the wrists works it wide of mid-on
he chases a really wide one, this was too wide outside off, gets the toe of the bat and still races to third man
gets away with another full and wide one this time, reaches out and places it to cover
fullish outside off and he mistimes it to cover
makes a bit of room and comes down a few paces and checks his shot, places it to third man
this was fullish on the pads and flicked away to mid-on
the intent was there when he made a hint of room, ended up punching it straight to cover, nicely timed
this was bowled on a yorker length outside off, fails to connect on the drive and the bat hits the ground
stylishly flicked away, this was pitched up on off stump and he clipped that easily over mid-on and midwicket
good length outside off and he fails to make contact on the cut
this was smacked hard onto the pitch and had enough mileage to whizz past Watson, long-off's there to cut it off
that was too wide outside off and not called, Rahane couldn't help chasing it
Rahane uses his feet this time, Starc's predictable with his line, down the track and smashes it wide of mid-off and cover
low full toss swinging in and clipped straight to square leg
he fires this wide down  the leg side, tries to flick
comes down a few paces and flicks a full delivery on the pads to square leg, well stopped by Warner
he opens the face of the bat at the last minute and guides it to third man
this was shorter outside off and he stays beside the line and places it to deep point
good running, he stays back and knocks it to the on side and sets off quickly
he gets forward, opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
he stays back at the crease and clips it to midwicket
third man is the most favored location, once again opens the face of the bat and gently steers it there, time for a slip?
goes the other way this time, this was dragged too short, the bounce was just alright for him to rock back and pull wide of square leg
Rahane doesn't get the third man steer right this time, cramped for room and he ends up chopping it to the keeper
tossed up by Muirhead and he gets an inside edge to the leg side
Muirhead strikes second ball! He isn't afraid to toss this up, draws Kohli out of the crease and he lofts down the ground, he can't clear long-off though, taken by White at the edge of the circle
a loosener to get off the mark, a half tracker on the leg stump and he swivels and pulls but deep square-leg's there
great stop by Starc, this was bowled flatter and Rahane did well to cut with the turn, Starc made lots of ground to his right at deep point and pulled it back
good turn for Muirhead, he stays back and punches it to the off side
goes back and clips it with the turn to square leg
close call for Yuvi! He was looking to sweep but the extra turn and bounce saved the batsman, would have missed the off stump
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
he looked to flick a shorter one and played all around it, sign of a man out of form
almost a run out! Yuvraj clips it to the on side and sets off and slips, Rahane was off the blocks quickly and had to quickly turn around, luckily the bowler couldn't gather the ball in time
gets forward and defends this one
works it to short fine leg
good length outside off and he taps it wide of point

Rahane had steered quite a few to third man with success earlier but he wasn't so lucky this time, Bollinger got a nice angle across the right-hander, Rahane looked to guide this to third man, cramped for room and outside edge easily taken by the keeper
fullish on the stumps and defended down the track
he stays back and knocks it to the on side
he really banged this in short and Raina was quickly on the back foot to pull
he stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
skids through and he stays back and punches it to the off side
flatter one and he goes on the back foot and punches it wide of cover
dropped by Maxwell but a tough one, he was down the track and scooped it to Maxwell's right, he got a hand to it
tossed up and he gets forward to defend
gets forward and chips it down to midwicket, checkec his shot
stays back and clips it to the leg side
punches it down the track and Bollinger picks up and nearly flings it back
swings it towards the pads and he gently flicks it to square leg
that should give Yuvraj a lot of self belief, this was a half volley outside off, he stays at the crease, doesn't stretch too far forward and times it well wide of cover
Yuvraj slips on the pitch again and survives..again, he taps this to the off side, sets off for a quick run and slips and falls, scampers back and luckily for him the throw was wide
that bouncer had Yuvraj in a tangle, he arched backwards and decided rather late to play the upper cut, not far from the edge, half appeal from Bollinger, Haddin wasn't sure
this was drifting on the pads and Yuvraj fails to make contact, should have put that away
he goes back and punches it to the off side
flatter delivery and he turns it to square leg
finds long-on! India have lost the form batsman, he went down the track and looked to clear long-on but didn't get the elevation, easy catch for Finch
he goes back at the crease and clips it to the on side
continues round the wicket to Dhoni, he goes back and punches it to long-off
flatter delivery and he sweeps him down to deep square leg
tossed up outside off and he gets forward and drives to the off side
hitting against the turn and well! Tossed up outside off and he comes down the track, adjusts his shot and whips it wide of midwicket, long-on gives up
goes back and clips it against the turn
tossed up down the leg side and wide called
nudged off the pads to the on side
bowled from wide of the crease round the wicket, pitches outside leg and clips the pads, optimistic shout for lbw, they sneak in two leg byes
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
more typical Yuvraj this time! This was a short ball, deserved to be spanked, he rocked back and bludgeons it several rows over deep midwicket
another short ball murdered! This is terrible bowling, flat and sits up for Yuvraj to pull this over long-on
he goes back and punches it to the off side
flatter delivery on the leg stump and he clips it to midwicket
a bit early on the sweep but he manages to check his shot and place it to deep square leg
this was short and flat and cut away wide of backward point, Warner has some work to do to mop up and he does well at the deep point
brilliantly stopped at short cover, Yuvraj was forward for a booming cover drive, the fielder was alert
surprised him with a short delivery and he ended up swatting it to midwicket, not timed
tucks him up for room as he punches it to cover
another short one and he was too early on the pull, ended up gloving it towards the keeper
this was a low full toss wide outside the off stump and he drives to deep cover
low full toss but really wide outside the off stump, doesn't chase it
wide down the leg side and Haddin fails to gather it, costs Australia more runs
skidded through and Dhoni was on the backfoot, managed to flick it very late
Dhoni was looking to send that to the roof over long-on but missed it completely
that was miscued but safe, Dhoni rocked back to pull in front of square, drops well in front of long-on, there was a fumble and Yuvraj was quick for the second
fails to out away a low full toss, fetched from outside off and swatted back to the bowler
skids through and he's still rooted to the back foot, clipped to fine leg
clears the infield, this was sprayed a bit too wide, he reached out and launched it over mid-off
this was banged in short and he swivels and pulls him down to deep square leg for a couple
swinging in on the pads and he clips it straight to fine leg

Dhoni takes the photographer down at fine leg! This was banged in short from round the wicket, swivels and pulls and a photographer from Kolkata tries to evade it and he falls backwards, taking the camera with him, all's well!
he drifts wide down the leg side
Maxwell fumbles! This was a low full toss swinging in, clipped away wide of midwicket, Maxwell makes ground to his left at deep midwicket and he gets a hand to it and fumbles
full outside off and he drills this straight to cover
he's back in form alright! That six was evidence, this was fast and pitched up, he makes room and sends it soaring miles in the air, clears long-off comfortably
Watson comes round the wicket, this was a low full toss clipped to deep square leg
this was a yorker fired outside, tries to dig it out but misses
bangs it in short, Yuvraj was quick on his feet, swiveled and was ready for the hook early, just short of the rope at fine leg
nearly gave it away there by chasing a wide one, nearly caught the toe of the bat
makes a fitting statement as he gets to his fifty! It was a full toss, he bends and whips it over deep square leg, effortless
taking Watson to the cleaners, he bangs it in short down the leg side, he swivels and hooks over the keeper, 16 off the over
he follows that up with a yorker wide outside off, tries to dig it out but misses
comes round the wicket and fires it full, drills it down to long-off
Starc loses control of that and fires it wide down the leg side
gets away with a full toss, this was a high full toss close to the waist, he mistimes it wide of midwicket and Yuvraj gestures to the umpire that it may have been high
Starc comes round the wicket to Dhoni and fires that on the stumps, Dhoni made room to clear cover and missed, the ball hits the middle stump
misses out on a low full toss, flicks it to square leg
that was another full toss, failed to cash in, made room and the ball gets the bottom edge
another low full toss he fails to put away, this was swinging in, looked an inside edge to the pads

Yuvraj fails to last till the end but he'll go back feeling very satisfied nevertheless, this was pitched up outside off, he scoops this straight to Maxwell at long-off, a bit more on it and he would have cleared the rope
good stop by Starc at deep cover, low full toss driven firmly in that direction, Starc timed his dive well
low and wide full toss, he had to reach out, placed it to third man
it's an overstep! From round the wicket, low full toss and Ashwin misses out by edging it to the pads, he has another chance with the Free hit
Free Hit: Ashwin takes guard miles outside leg, he can only place it to the deep on the leg side for a couple

soft dismissal, Ashwin went down the pitch and failed to put away a full toss, the ball drops on the pitch but they run anyway, Jadeja was never going to beat Watson to it, he charges at the stumps and removes the bails
another low full toss and they fail to put it away, clips the pads and rolls to the off side
